alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Coffee; Davidson; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Warren; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Smith, southeastern Davidson, De Kalb, Rutherford, Warren, southeastern Williamson, northern Coffee, southern Wilson and Cannon Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Murfreesboro to near McMinnville. Movement was east at 20 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were located near Statesville and near Dowelltown. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, McMinnville, Smithville, Woodbury, Smyrna, La Vergne, Nolensville, Watertown, Walterhill, Rural Hill, Alexandria, Morrison, Eagleville, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Centertown, Rock Island State Park, Triune and Cedars Of Lebanon State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 63 and 94. Interstate 840 between mile markers 34 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; Coffee; Davidson; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Warren; Williamson; Wilson
